title: Lamar Jackson's absence; Expectations for Trey Lance; Kap's workout
itunes:title: Lamar Jackson's absence; Expectations for Trey Lance; Kap's workout
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins examining Lamar Jackson’s absence from OTA’s.  Hosts Peter Schrager, Rachel Bonnetta, Adam Rank and former NFL DB DeAngelo Hall explain why they’re not worried about Lamar but how it could become a problem. Next, Rachel shares her list of top 5 runs by 'non' RBs which includes runs from Steve McNair and Michael Vick but who did she reward at #1? Then Peter picks his “decade dynamos” from the 2000’s and later the GMFB crew shares their expectations for Trey Lance as the starting quarterback for the San Francisco 49ers. The GMFB podcast finishes up weighing in on Colin Kaepernick’s workout with the Las Vegas Raiders.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
